original_text: He gave you manna to eat in the wilderness, something your ancestors had never known, to humble and test you so that in the end it might go well with you.
korean_text: 네 조상들도 알지 못하던 만나를 광야에서 네게 먹이셨나니 이는 다 너를 낮추시며 너를 시험하사 마침내 네게 복을 주려 하심이었느니라

sentences.original_text: He gave you manna to eat in the wilderness
something your ancestors had never known
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 조상들이 결코 알지 못했던 것을

sentences.original_text: so that in the end it might go well with you
sentences.korean_translation: 결국 당신에게 잘 되게 하시려는 것입니다
